info.name: Twitch Better UI
info.description: Modernize Twitch with a new clean, simple, and compact UI.
info.additionalInfo:
Details:
Better Chat
Better Panel Description
Better Button
Better Cinema mode
Better Title and more more... 


Version Release 1.0.1:

- Added better ui Cinema mode

- Added Information Version (TBUI) in Video Player
